segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and my eyes are immediately drawn to the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the faucet, completely filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's already overflowing onto the counter, creating a small waterfall over the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is spreading across the floor right at the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed this alarming situation yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged in the water, but her expression remains utterly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely absorbed in drying a plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water is going to cause some serious damage if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about the wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn that faucet off right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a shocking sight to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a simple task, yet it's gone so wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
